FuncDef: The pki import-crl command imports the CRL to the memory. The pki import-crl command imports the CRL to the memory.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an imported certificate file. Only the PEM and DER formats are supported.
The value must be an existing certificate file name.

Specifies the PKI realm name of the imported certificate.
The value must be an existing PKI realm name.

Examples: [*HUAWEI] pki import-crl realm abc filename abc.crl
Warning: The file in the flash will be deleted. Please select 'N' if you want to keep it. Please select [Y/N]:y
[~HUAWEI] pki import-crl realm default filename abc.crl
Warning: The file in the flash will be deleted. Please select 'N' if you want to keep it. Please select [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo: To enable the CRL that is obtained in out-of-band mode or is updated manually, run this command to import the CRL to the memory.
